Uses of Class
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes.Line

Packages that use Line
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.convert Provides support for converting geometric objects to AWT and SWT. 
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.shapes Provides support for geometric calculations based on shapes. 
org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.utils Provides utility classes being used internally for geometric calculations.

          Converts a AWT Line2D into a GEF4 Line.

 boolean Polygon.intersects(Line line)
          Checks if there is at least one common point between this Polygon and the given Line, which includes the case that the given Line is fully contained.
 boolean Line.intersects(Line l)
          Tests whether this Line and the given one intersect, i.e. if they share at least one common point.
 boolean Ellipse.intersects(Line l)
          At least one common point, which includes containment (check getIntersections() to check if this is a true intersection).

          Transforms a sequence of Point coordinates into a sequence of Line segments, by creating a Line segment for each two adjacent points in the array.
